review: Love the fire stick. Awesome selection!!!!
author: Miguel

review: While it provides us with many new options for viewing, the keypad is way too sensitive.It "jumps" over categories, making it almost impossible to find what I want to watch on the "first shot".Trying to set up ancient for free Netflix and just spent 20 minutes - still no luck. The keypad keeps duplicates letters and doesn't navigate to the next screen well.If it were not for the trouble that I am having with the keypad - I would rate this product much higher.
author: George Ritchie

review: It is much easier to watch movies now that I don't have to hook up my computer to the tv to watch a movie. Just push a button and it is on
author: Shirle J. Gerwig

review: I enjoy the fire stick very much
author: pete millard

review: At first didn't know how to work it but so far very good buy, would purchase again
author: alvina hunt

review: I love this item in many ways.  It freezes and the audio continues.  Often.
author: Daniel S. Hermes

review: Love it. Super fast and never fail. Far better then my chrom cast.
author: Greig

review: Nice to be able to watch movies and TV shows. This Fire Stick works perfect, and I highly recommend this to everyone. But remember you have to purchase PRIME to enjoy all the movies and TV shows!!
author: David B. Townsend
